2011-01-11

I like big muscles and red corpuscles

I just watched Gentlemen Prefer Blondes for the first time in many MANY years... it was dreadful... with the exception of Jane Russell who was hilarious and had the two best musical numbers.

Ain't There Anyone Here for Love is hilariously camp (and the best song in the film)...

After the familiar and ridiculous Monroe version of Diamonds are a Girl's Best Friend (it had chandeliers made out of women!) seeing Jane Russell's courtroom version is a treat:

Here is a nice review of the film from someone who liked it a little more than me (only a little though).
